updateUserPass: update ingswschema.users set password_registration=crypt(?, gen_salt('md5')) where id=?;
updateUserAdmin: update ingswschema.users set email=?, nick_name=?, telephone_number=?, path_image=?, is_administrator=? where id_user=?;
validateUserPass: select ingswschema.users.*, (password= crypt(?, password)) AS pswmatch from users where email=?;
